text:
[St. Petersburg, FL - ONSITE preferred, REMOTE an option] The Tampa Bay Rays are hiring 1-2 developers to work on software for baseball operations. The general job posting is here: [1], but feel free to reach out even if you don't think you satisfy all of the requirements listed.

[1] http://baseballjobs.teamworkonline.com/teamwork/r.cfm?i=8381...
